706782f-a.title: Brooklyn: Shore Road - 83rd Street
706782f-a.text:
Shore Poad, west side, from 85th to 83rd Streets. showing the Crescent
Athletic Club, oposite 83rd Street, which was destroyed by fire in April 1933.
About 1918.
Eugene L Armbruster Collection.

706781f-a.title: Brooklyn: Shore Road - 83rd Street
706781f-a.text:
Shore Road, west side, opposite 83rd Street, showing the Crescent
Athletic Club's boat-house, which was destroyed by fire in April 1933.
This organization has its origin in a football club, organined in 1884 by
William H. Ford, and was on leased grounds located at the corner of 9th
Ave and 9th Street, Brooklyn. The club v ich was incorporated in Feb.
1888, took over in the spring of 1839 the land and boat-house of the Nereid
Boat Club. In the same year they purchased from the Van Brunt and Bergen
estates of Bay Ridge a tract of land extending from 83rd to 85th Streets,
and from Shore Road to Colonial Road. On Decoration Day 1892, the club
house which costd2480,O00 was opened to the members.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

Juune 5, 1931.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(3)

October 1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
